name: Jasra Inc.
overview:
Jasra Inc’s headquarters are based in Calgary, Alberta Canada with associates in Kelowna BC and Banglore/Hyderabad India. Jasra Inc was founded by internet marketing veteran, Manoj Jasra who’s vision is to help individuals grow their businesses successfully online and to give them the insight/education/tools to continue to do this long-term.

There are 3 types of scenarios we feel that we can provide real value to:

  1. Small Business: Whether it’s getting an organization get started from the ground up or help an existing business adjust their online strategies with precision tweaks, we simply love seeing hard-working small businesses go from good to great.

  2. Enterprise: In large organizations it’s often difficult to get buy-in for online strategies, we can help by coming in to educate your team, identifying quick wins and advise how to design long-term processes/strategies.

  3. Consulting: Your organization simply might need some occasional advise on a new online vision or product - we’ve reviewed hundreds of tools and deliverables, so we’ll give you our honest opinion as well as suggest how to take your vision to the next level.
